contents.text: Thank you for calling FinancialForce in San Francisco, the cloud ERP solution built on Salesforce for unified front and back office.
For accounting and financial management on our cloud ERP platform, press 1.
For billing and invoicing support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and invoicing specialists.

navigationGoals: I need to resolve a discrepancy on last month’s invoice.
I need help correcting a billing error on my account.
Debug my automated billing process—last night’s invoices failed to generate.
I need help understanding and paying my billing statement.
I need assistance issuing a corrected invoice for a research grant payment.

contents.text: For general ledger and financial reporting assistance, press 2.
Please hold and we will transfer you to our general ledger support team.

navigationGoals: I need help reconciling my general ledger for Q2.
Help me reconcile my department’s general ledger transactions.
Customize a consolidated general ledger report for our Q2 financials.
I need assistance reconciling my accounts and generating my financial report.
I want to generate a clear general ledger report for my lab’s funding account.

contents.text: For implementation services and technical support, press 2.
For onboarding and team training, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our onboarding and training team.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule onboarding and training for our new finance team members.
I need to schedule onboarding and training sessions for my finance team.
Schedule a team training session to onboard staff on ERP configuration workflows.
I need step-by-step help setting up my account and learning how to use the system.
I’d like to schedule an onboarding and ERP training session for my research team.

contents.text: For technical troubleshooting and system maintenance, press 2.
Please stay on the line while we transfer you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need assistance troubleshooting a system error in our ERP integration.
I’m getting an error when loading financial reports and need troubleshooting assistance.
Investigate slow API response times and arrange system patch updates.
I need help troubleshooting a login error in the system.
I’m troubleshooting a data sync error between Salesforce and our ERP system.
